request.description: Firebase Message example, using Flutter Awesome Notifications
Firebase Message example, using Flutter Awesome Notifications

body.raw:
{
  "message": {
        "token": "{{fcm_token_android}}",
        "android": {
            "priority": "high"
        },
        "apns": {
            "payload": {
                "aps": {
                    "mutable-content": 1,
                    "badge": 11
                },
                "headers": {
                    "apns-priority": 5
                }
            }
        },
        "notification": {
        "title": "This title is written in english",
        "body": "Now it is really easy to translate a notification content, including images and buttons!",
        "image": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-en.jpg"
        },
        "data": {
            "content.id": "{{id}}",
            "content.badge": "11",
            "content.channelKey": "alerts",
            "content.displayOnForeground": "true",
            "content.notificationLayout": "BigPicture",
            "content.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/american.jpg",
            "content.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-en.jpg",
            "content.showWhen": "null",
            "content.autoDismissible": "null",
            "content.privacy": "null",
            "content.payload.uuid": "user-profile-uuid",
            "actionButtons.0.key": "AGREED1",
            "actionButtons.0.label": "I agree",
            "actionButtons.0.autoDismissible": "true",
            "actionButtons.0.actionType": "null",
            "actionButtons.0.isDangerousOption": "null",
            "actionButtons.1.key": "AGREED2",
            "actionButtons.1.label": "I agree too",
            "actionButtons.1.autoDismissible": "true",
            "actionButtons.1.actionType": "DismissAction",
            "actionButtons.1.isDangerousOption": "true",
            "localizations.pt-br.title": "Este título está escrito em português do Brasil!",
            "localizations.pt-br.body": "Agora é muito fácil traduzir o conteúdo das notificações, incluindo imagens e botões!",
            "localizations.pt-br.summary": "Traduções Awesome Notifications",
            "localizations.pt-br.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-pt-br.jpg",
            "localizations.pt-br.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/brazilian.jpg",
            "localizations.pt-br.buttonLabels.AGREED1": "Eu concordo!",
            "localizations.pt-br.buttonLabels.AGREED2": "Eu concordo também!",
            "localizations.zh.title": "这个标题是用中文写的",
            "localizations.zh.body": "现在，轻松翻译通知内容，包括图像和按钮！",
            "localizations.zh.summary": "Awesome Notifications 翻译",
            "localizations.zh.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-zh.jpg",
            "localizations.zh.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/chinese.jpg",
            "localizations.zh.buttonLabels.AGREED1": "我同意",
            "localizations.zh.buttonLabels.AGREED2": "我也同意",
            "localizations.ko.title": "이 타이틀은 한국어로 작성되었습니다",
            "localizations.ko.body": "이제 이미지 및 버튼을 포함한 알림 콘텐츠를 쉽게 번역할 수 있습니다!",
            "localizations.ko.summary": "어썸 알림 번역",
            "localizations.ko.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-ko.jpg",
            "localizations.ko.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/korean.jpg",
            "localizations.ko.buttonLabels.AGREED1": "동의합니다",
            "localizations.ko.buttonLabels.AGREED2": "저도 동의합니다",
            "localizations.de.title": "Dieser Titel ist in Deutsch geschrieben",
            "localizations.de.body": "Jetzt ist es wirklich einfach, den Inhalt einer Benachrichtigung zu übersetzen, einschließlich Bilder und Schaltflächen!",
            "localizations.de.summary": "Awesome Notifications Übersetzungen",
            "localizations.de.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-de.jpg",
            "localizations.de.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/german.jpg",
            "localizations.de.buttonLabels.AGREED1": "Ich stimme zu",
            "localizations.de.buttonLabels.AGREED2": "Ich stimme auch zu",
            "localizations.pt.title": "Este título está escrito em português de Portugal!",
            "localizations.pt.body": "Agora é muito fácil traduzir o conteúdo das notificações, incluindo imagens e botões!",
            "localizations.pt.summary": "Traduções Awesome Notifications",
            "localizations.pt.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-pt.jpg",
            "localizations.pt.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/portuguese.jpg",
            "localizations.pt.buttonLabels.AGREED1": "Eu concordo!",
            "localizations.pt.buttonLabels.AGREED2": "Eu concordo também!",
            "localizations.es.title": "Este título está escrito en español!",
            "localizations.es.body": "Ahora es muy fácil traducir el contenido de las notificaciones, incluyendo imágenes y botones.",
            "localizations.es.summary": "Traducciones de Awesome Notifications",
            "localizations.es.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-es.jpg",
            "localizations.es.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/spanish.jpg",
            "localizations.es.buttonLabels.AGREED1": "Estoy de acuerdo",
            "localizations.es.buttonLabels.AGREED2": "También estoy de acuerdo"
        }
    }
}

request.description: Firebase Message example, using Flutter Awesome Notifications

body.raw:
{
  "message": {
        "token": "{{fcm_token_ios}}",
        "android": {
            "priority": "high"
        },
        "apns": {
            "payload": {
                "aps": {
                    "mutable-content": 1,
                    "badge": 11
                },
                "headers": {
                    "apns-priority": 5
                }
            }
        },
        "notification": {
            "title": "Original title in english",
            "body" : "Original body in english"
        },
        "data": {
            "content.id": "{{id}}",
            "content.badge": "11",
            "content.titleLocKey": "not_loc_key",
            "content.bodyLocKey": "not_loc_key",
            "content.titleLocArgs": "[\"title\"]",
            "content.bodyLocArgs": "body",
            "content.channelKey": "alerts",
            "content.displayOnForeground": "true",
            "content.notificationLayout": "BigPicture",
            "content.showWhen": "null",
            "content.autoDismissible": "null",
            "content.privacy": "null",
            "content.payload.uuid": "user-profile-uuid",
            "actionButtons.0.key": "AGREED1",
            "actionButtons.0.label": "I agree",
            "actionButtons.0.autoDismissible": "true",
            "actionButtons.0.actionType": "null",
            "actionButtons.0.isDangerousOption": "null",
            "actionButtons.1.key": "AGREED2",
            "actionButtons.1.label": "I agree too",
            "actionButtons.1.autoDismissible": "true",
            "actionButtons.1.actionType": "DismissAction",
            "actionButtons.1.isDangerousOption": "true",
            "localizations.en.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-en.jpg",
            "localizations.en.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/american.jpg",
            "localizations.pt-br.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-pt-br.jpg",
            "localizations.pt-br.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/brazilian.jpg",
            "localizations.zh.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-zh.jpg",
            "localizations.zh.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/chinese.jpg",
            "localizations.ko.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-ko.jpg",
            "localizations.ko.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/korean.jpg",
            "localizations.de.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-de.jpg",
            "localizations.de.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/german.jpg",
            "localizations.pt.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-pt.jpg",
            "localizations.pt.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/portuguese.jpg",
            "localizations.es.bigPicture": "asset://assets/images/awn-rocks-es.jpg",
            "localizations.es.largeIcon": "asset://assets/images/spanish.jpg",
        }
    }
}

request.description: Firebase Message example, using Flutter Awesome Notifications

body.raw:
{
    "message": {
        "token": "{{fcm_token_android}}",
        "apns": {
            "payload": {
                "aps": {
                    "content-available": 1,
                    "badge": 42
                }
            }
        },
        "notification": {
            "title": "Huston! The eagle has landed!",
            "body": "A small step for a man, but a giant leap to Flutter's community!"
        },
        "data" : {
            "content.id": "1",
            "content.badge": "42",
            "content.channelKey": "alerts",
            "content.displayOnForeground": "true",
            "content.notificationLayout": "BigPicture",
            "content.largeIcon": "https://br.web.img3.acsta.net/pictures/19/06/18/17/09/0834720.jpg",
            "content.bigPicture": "https://www.dw.com/image/49519617_303.jpg",
            "content.showWhen": "true",
            "content.autoDismissible": "true",
            "content.privacy": "Private",
            "content.payload.secret": "Awesome Notifications Rocks!",
            "actionButtons.0.key": "REDIRECT",
            "actionButtons.0.label": "label1",
            "actionButtons.0.autoDismissible": "true",
            "actionButtons.1.key": "DISMISS",
            "actionButtons.1.label": "label2",
            "actionButtons.1.actionType": "DismissAction",
            "actionButtons.1.isDangerousOption": "true",
            "actionButtons.1.autoDismissible": "true",
            "Android.content.title": "Android! The eagle has landed!",
            "Android.content.payload.android": "android custom content!",
            "Android.actionButtons.0.key": "REDIRECT",
            "Android.actionButtons.0.label": "Redirect",
            "Android.actionButtons.0.autoDismissible": "true",
            "Android.actionButtons.1.key": "DISMISS",
            "Android.actionButtons.1.label": "Dismiss",
            "Android.actionButtons.1.actionType": "DismissAction",
            "Android.actionButtons.1.isDangerousOption": "true",
            "Android.actionButtons.1.autoDismissible": "true",
            "iOS.content.title": "Jobs! The eagle has landed!",
            "iOS.content.payload.ios": "ios custom content!",
            "iOS.actionButtons.0.key": "REDIRECT",
            "iOS.actionButtons.0.label": "Redirect message",
            "iOS.actionButtons.0.autoDismissible": "true",
            "iOS.actionButtons.1.key": "DISMISS",
            "iOS.actionButtons.1.label": "Dismiss message",
            "iOS.actionButtons.1.actionType": "DismissAction",
            "iOS.actionButtons.1.isDangerousOption": "true",
            "iOS.actionButtons.1.autoDismissible": "true"
        }
    }
}
